title: Stonepeak’s Rinchem Seeks Distressed Exchange to Fund Buyout
description: Rinchem, a Stonepeak Partners-backed chemical logistics and services company, is asking some lenders to accept losses as part of a debt deal to help finance its acquisition of Dupré Logistics, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
